original_text: And king Rehoboam took counsel with the old men that had stood before Solomon his father while he yet lived, saying, What counsel give ye me to return answer to this people?
korean_text: 르호보암 왕이 그의 아버지 솔로몬의 생전에 그 앞에 모셨던 원로들과 의논하여 이르되 너희는 이 백성에게 어떻게 대답하도록 권고하겠느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: And king Rehoboam took counsel with old men
that had stood before Solomon his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 아버지 솔로몬 앞에 섰던 자들이며

sentences.original_text: saying, What counsel give ye me
sentences.korean_translation: 이르되 너희가 내게 무슨 조언을 주겠느냐

sentences.original_text: to return answer to this people?
